short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a page action and a context menu option (for images) to upload to Danbooru.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replacement for bookmarklets with better referrer handling.

Usage
=====

Upload single post via context menu:
* Find a picture on the web
* Right click on the image
* Click Upload to Danbooru

Upload post/batch via page action:
* Navigate to one of the supported sites
* Navigate to the image view page
* Click on the Danbooru ("cardboard box") icon on the extensions toolbar

Note: Although this extension allows you to upload images from any website, you should be careful to not to upload thumbnail/sample from sites not supported by Danbooru. List of the supported sites can be found here: https://danbooru.donmai.us/static/bookmarklet
